thread.title: MRS S J SHEPHERD
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by MRS S J SHEPHERD

author: MRS S J SHEPHERD
title: MRS S J SHEPHERD
text: Excellent service. I looked on line for blinds and found blinds 2go. I requested a sample and received it within 48 hours. I measured recess as advised and ordered my blind. It was delivered on specified date. It fits perfectly. It was so easy and they look lovely. Wouldn't hesitate using them again and would definitely recommend them. Thankyou.
